name: game (part time crazy)
description: You are part of a small expedition group on a planet with a toxic atmosphere, to your crew's shock you discovered lifeforms on the planet that your team nicknamed the Akisa (ak-e-sa) people. The Akisa people fight with spears and primitive tools. After a brief war, humans claimed the planet and have sent several teams of people all over to set up outposts. The captain of your team brought with him a spear from the war. Explore and discover what mysteries this planet holds.
